About Me

BIO

In 2018, I left behind almost a decade of success working in secondary schools, to pursue my dreams of becoming a Front-End Developer. For almost a year, I would finish long days of educating young people, and turn my attention to schooling myself in code every evening. While my story isn’t unique, it is teaching specialties in Adobe Suite and digital design that sets me aside from my peers. I continue to deliver such content on YouTube.

tDigital

Front End Developer

Languages include-

  • HTML5 CSS3, SCSS (Node), Bootstrap;
  • JavaScript (up to ES8), jQuery, Babel (Node);
  • API requests using promises, JSON and XML;
  • Git (Bash), with remote repository at GitHub.

Virgin Money

Voluntary Placement

Aside from developing my front-end skills, I gained experience of-

  • Project Management
  • User Experience
  • Testing & Accessibility
  • Analytics
  • E-Commerce & Trading

Kenton School

Teacher

The full list of responsibilities can be found on my LinkedIn page.

In the last academic year, my results and attainment were in the top 5% of the school, and lessons were frequently ranked at ‘Outstanding’. This is all while learning to code.
